name: NorCal Flight Center, LLC
about: NorCal Flight Center, LLC, located at Lincoln Airport in Northern California, offers comprehensive flight training programs tailored to individual schedules and budgets. As a family-owned and operated Part 61 flight school, we provide private, instrument, and commercial pilot training with no upfront costs, allowing students to pay at the completion of each lesson. Our well-maintained fleet and experienced, friendly instructors ensure a safe and supportive learning environment. We also offer aircraft repairs, aviation services, and a fully stocked pilot supply store. With 24/7 flying lesson availability and no waitlist, NorCal Flight Center is committed to helping students achieve their aviation goals efficiently and affordably. Call us at 916-794-1359 to get started on your flight training journey.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Night Rating"]
